task: Organize and execute a global sustainability hackathon with the following objectives: 1. Develop a virtual platform capable of hosting collaborative coding events for 500 global teams. 2. Facilitate global mentorship through AI-driven pairing with industry experts. 3. Create a schedule with diverse programming tracks focusing on renewable energy, waste reduction, and water conservation. 4. Implement a project submission system that supports peer review and public voting. 5. Establish partnerships with environmental organizations for prize sponsorship and project implementation. 6. Provide multilingual support and resources for diverse participation. 7. Track and report the hackathon’s impact on environmental innovation.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: Primary coordinator for the sustainability hackathon, managing interaction with all sub-agents to achieve the event objectives.

agents.name: virtual_platform_agent
agents.role: Responsible for developing a robust virtual platform for hosting coding events and managing global team coordination.

agents.name: mentorship_facilitation_agent
agents.role: Facilitates global mentorship through smart pairings of participants with industry experts.

agents.name: track_creation_agent
agents.role: Designs programming tracks focusing on specific sustainability challenges, coordinating with experts for content development.

agents.name: submission_system_agent
agents.role: Manages the project submission and evaluation system, incorporating peer review and public voting features.

agents.name: partnership_development_agent
agents.role: Establishes connections with environmental organizations for sponsorship and supports project viability.

agents.name: multilingual_support_agent
agents.role: Provides language support and resources to facilitate participation from diverse linguistic backgrounds.

agents.name: impact_tracking_agent
